title: Auto-increment todo IDs
description:
Replace random 3-char ID generation with a simple auto-incrementing integer system. Current approach requires manual ID creation and collision checking. Switch to scanning existing todos for the highest ID and incrementing.

Options:
- Simple integer (1, 2, 3...)
- Zero-padded (001, 002, 003...)
- Store last ID in a counter file

Update the todo skill SKILL.md and reference.md to reflect the new scheme.
nextStep: Decide on ID format and update todo skill
